archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.3.1: Two or more system development environments (e.g. analysis and design environment, development environment and testing environment) should be established, in which development and testing activities can be performed.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
